Fort_Lauderdale.Fort Lauderdale station (Brightline): Fort Lauderdale's Brightline train station is located in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. It is served by All Aboard Florida Brightline rail system, connecting Miami, West Palm Beach and Orlando International Airport. The station is located in downtown Fort Lauderdale, on NW 2nd Avenue between Broward Boulevard and NW 4th Street, adjacent to the Broward County Transit's Central Terminal.
